properties.message: Track Mafia: Thursdays at 6:30pm, Paddington Recreation Ground W9 1PF. Free track training in 4-week blocks. All abilities welcome, bag drop available.
Your Friendly Runners: Saturdays at 9am, Lodestar Coffee E5 8EE. East London-based friendly running group for all abilities. Bag drop available.
One Track: Thursday at 6:30pm, Duke of York Square SW3 4LY. Track runs in Chelsea led by coach Fletch. All abilities welcome, bag drop on site.

Pure Sport Run Club: Wednesday at 6:15pm, Battersea Park Track Entrance/Pure Sport HQ (alternate weeks). Weekly social 5k of intervals plus monthly track night. All abilities welcome, bag drop available.
Tempo run club: Tuesday at 6:45pm, Peckham Levels SE15 4ST. Community of musicians and DJs in South London. Free weekly run for all abilities, bag drop and open deck DJ sets.

Mafia Moves: Tuesday at 6.30pm, Beaverton Corner Pin N17 0AG, and Saturday at 9:30am, Tottenham Stadium. Weekly runs for all abilities in north London led by coach Andre. Free sessions with bag drop available.

Grove lane runners: Wednesday at 7:30am and Sunday at 8:45am, Govelane Deli SE5 8SY. Friendly 5's on Sundays and mid-week miles on Wednesdays in south London. All abilities welcome, bag drop available.
Tracksmith Run Clubs: Various locations in London. Several weekly run clubs led by coach Amrit. Check Tracksmith Strava for event details.
properties.timetable: Various times, check Tracksmith Strava for details

properties.message: Solemother: Various locations. Super fun, sassy, and supportive social exercise group for women. Activities include runs, hikes, swims, classes, and social events.
Run Talk Run: Various locations across the UK. Running group and mental health support community. Casual jogs and supportive conversations.
properties.timetable: Check website for local group times

properties.message: Park Run UK: Various locations. Free 5K runs every Saturday morning. Register online, print barcode, and join any event worldwide.
Run Dem Crew: London. Fun running crew with emphasis on community, youth mentoring, and creative endeavors.
Midnight Runners: London. Runs with loud beats, exercise stops, and a party atmosphere. No one left behind policy.
WMN RUN: London and Bristol. Mission to bridge the gender gap in running. Regular social runs and race training opportunities.
Mikkeller Running Club: London. Combines running with food and beer. Global operation with a focus on balancing fitness and enjoyment of life.
Our Parks: Various locations across UK parks. Free fitness classes including running. Focus on accessibility and inclusivity.
properties.timetable: Check website for local class times
